description: This course explores the meaning and significance of Jesus Christ in major New Testament writings: the Gospels, the letters of Paul, Hebrews, Revelation. Students also examine the development of New Testament ideas about Christ in subsequent Christian tradition, both classical and contemporary. Prerequisite: BTS-B. Counts towards ancient studies major.
name: Jesus in Script/Trad
prerequisites: BTS-B. Counts towards ancient studies major.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: BTS-B. Counts towards ancient studies major.

title: Jesus in Scripture and Tradition
